verbs.description: Beyond any recent U.S. government , the Trump administration [V: is] so solidly siding with Israel over Gaza killings , and ignoring the Palestinian plight , that it is further isolating the United States internationally .

[ARGM-ADV: Beyond any recent U.S. government] , [ARG0: the Trump administration] is [ARGM-MNR: so solidly] [V: siding] [ARG1: with Israel] [ARG2: over Gaza killings] , and ignoring the Palestinian plight , that it is further isolating the United States internationally .
